name: Boxz.io
description:
BOXz.iO

- Build and build a vehicle war with that car. Each piece of equipment is the # 1 race car. A cute 2D game can increase the number of builds. When the player has enough experience, they can upgrade new weapons and attack other players to score.

Build and automotive / robot in vehicle mode. Decorate your car into the ultimate car. Put the attack zone with your weapon in the car.
